transcript:
Haan ji.
Hello.
Hello.
Han main ye bol raha tha ye bol raha tha aap aapko ye requirement apni side se post karni hogi aap ek bar aa jaye online main aapko guide kar dunga sir.
Abhi to main aa nahi sakta main market mein hu.
Achcha to kis time aap free ki line hai sir.
Main kal subah karta hu fir aap subah isi number se.
Thik hai na.
Thik hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Requirement to post from the customer's side.

- Customer is currently in the market and unavailable.



Resolution:

- Offer to guide the customer if they come online.

- Suggested to connect tomorrow morning.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Customer will call tomorrow morning.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

requirement, online guide, unavailable
